NAME tea
DLG ITM_0

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_0
But these are things I have only ever seen on-screen. Things so big. So big that they drown the horrors in their own sheer size. However, with these and more, I have only ever lived through others. Where is my sublime? What can I go to to drown you out?

DLG SPR_1
Up here the sounds of your voice are sucked in and swallowed by the wind and sky. 

DLG SPR_2
Out here the white whale we were all looking for rose to ask me to stay strong.

DLG SPR_3
Down here is deep. The deepest point on Earth, and for all your strong man body you will be beautifully crushed by its pressure. 

DLG SPR_4
You've rewired my brain, and taken the air out of my blood. But my body now and always will be sublime... We are now already in the next life. Our flesh made out of the same thing as everything... just look

DLG SPR_5
You made me nervous of my lips, but you know what's amazing about me?

DLG SPR_6
You made me scared to look but you know what's sublime about me? About you too I guess?

DLG SPR_7
You made me distrust the words "I love you", and I hate that. But you know what's sublime about the footprints you've walked in my blood?

DLG SPR_8
atoms under me, under you. in  them under them layers of layers of underneathness. So much space in and all around us. We travel the universe in every moment, our power unspeakable, our past more multiple than can be imagined... I hope you fear that

END 0


END undefined
in the centre of the very universe, that's where we lie, finally separated, finally sublimed. Washed away with no hope of control. This future does not need to make you submit, it is written into you, and will be the only thing to unwrite you from me.

VAR a
42
